setup.title: Connection data
setup.rscp-info: ATTENTION: The RSCP connection must first be activated on the home power station. To do this, go to the "Main menu", "Personalization", "User profile". There you can set the RSCP password on the second page and thus activate access.

summary.info: This device displays the HPS data over the selected time period
summary.title: Overview

messages.hps-not-available: Error accessing the home power station. Check the connection settings.
messages.hps-device-not-found: The Homey device of the home power station has been removed. Add the statistic device again.
messages.invalid-percentage: The percentage value must be >= 0 and <= 100.
messages.requested-max-charging-power-to-high: The requested maximum charging power of __REQUESTED__ watts is higher than the permitted maximum of __MAX__ watts of the home power station.
messages.requested-max-charging-power-to-low: The requested maximum charging power of __REQUESTED__ watts is lower than the permitted minimum of __MIN__ watts of the home power station.
messages.requested-max-charging-power-denied-by-h: The home power station has rejected the requested value of maximum charging power. Response: __RESULTCODE__
messages.removal-of-all-powerlimits-denied-by-hps: The home power station has refused to remove the power limits. Answer: Maximum charging limit: __CHARGING_RESULTCODE__, Maximum discharge limit: __DISCHARGING_RESULTCODE__, Start value: __START_RESULTCODE__, Switches: __SWITCH_RESULTCODE__
